content: The key message is that, we are on-track to meet our organic OCF growth target of approximately 10% for this year to generate solid equity free-cash flow in 2022, in-line with our budget for the year, to invest about $1 billion in CapEx this year, which is also consistent with our long-term target and we're also on-track on our key projects to highlight and crystallize value for our infrastructure and fintech arms, and on-track on reducing our net debt, with net debt down this quarter despite the tougher macro.
